revised_title: Numerical Stability Analysis of Divergent Channel Flows
tldr: This article presents a numerical finite difference method to analyze the stability of viscous fluid flow in divergent straight-walled channels. The method is compared with previous work using a modal approach, showing good agreement. The study extends the analysis to more realistic curved-wall channels, also with positive results. The research provides an alternative approach to previous W.K.B. methods and offers a numerical solution to the disturbance equations for slowly varying flows.
